thread.section_title: Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Queens/Queensboro Bridge - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Short but sweet!
thread.title_full: Short but sweet! - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Queens/Queensboro Bridge, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sue B
title: Short but sweet!
text: We had 3 nights there. The hotel staff were lovely, extremely helpful and pleasant. The shuttle provided to the metro station worked really well as did the trains. The recommendations they gave us for food places was useful and the Irish pub was excellent and within walking distance easily.
